translation.zh: 由于嫌疑人在被拘留期间自杀

translation.en: state's attorney Paul Ross has organized an investigative committee
translation.zh: 州检察官保罗罗斯组织了一个委员会

translation.en: to look into the tactics of the Becker County Sheriff's Office.
translation.zh: 调查贝克县警长办公室的办案程序

translation.en: You okay?
Hmm. Yes, thank you.
Sheriff's Department investigators worked in concert
translation.zh: 警长办公室的调查人员

translation.en: with Reno homicide detectives for several hours,
translation.zh: 与负责里诺凶杀案的警探协作了几个小时

translation.en: piecing together the evidence trail that led to the brisk apprehension of Wadenah.
translation.zh: 拼凑线索 迅速抓捕了瓦德纳

translation.en: Authorities here, while understandably disturbed
translation.zh: 当局虽然对一名助理警长

translation.en: by the brief hostage-taking of one of their deputies,
translation.zh: 被短暂挟持一事感到不安

translation.en: are taking some comfort
translation.zh: 但对在这个戏剧性的夜晚

translation.en: in the swift justice of this very dramatic evening. (AIRPLANE PASSING BY) (SLOT MACHINE WHIRRING AND DINGS)
translation.zh: 正义迅速得到了伸张感到些许欣慰

translation.en: (SIRENS WAILING) Yet, while an investigation is underway, the consensus seems clear.
translation.zh: 然而 虽然调查还在继续他们似乎有了明确的共识

translation.en: Wadenah confessed after being identified by the young snowmobiler.
translation.zh: 瓦德纳被那名儿童雪地摩托手认出后招供

translation.en: His suicide brought a brutal end...
translation.zh: 他的自杀造成了一个残酷的结局…

translation.en: WOMAN: (ON PA) Final boarding call, Northwest flight 1607 to Cabo San Lucas.
translation.zh: 西北航空前往圣卢卡斯角的1607航班 最后一次登机通知

translation.en: STORE CLERK: Customer, Oliver!
Morning. Morning.
Nice day today. Can we help you with anything? Anything in particular?
translation.zh: 今天天气不错你有什么特别的需要吗？

translation.en: Well, actually, probably there is.
l'm looking for a person. Annalise, or Anna-Lisa Hansen.
translation.zh: 我要找一个人她叫安娜丽斯或安娜丽萨汉森

translation.en: Yes. She would live above the electric store.
translation.zh: 好的 她住在电器店的楼上

translation.en: That would be a small unit. lt's two doors down to your left.
translation.zh: 那栋楼不大 往左走第三家就是

translation.en: Okay? And if l were you, I'd go around the corner and take the stairs up.
translation.zh: 如果我是你就会绕到后面 走楼梯上去

translation.en: You shouldn't have any trouble finding her.
And if you don't, come back.
translation.zh: 如果没找到她 你再过来

translation.en: Thank you very much. l appreciate your help.
You're welcome.
ANNALISE: So, what is it that you need to know?
(SIGHS) Well, l'm trying to fill in the gaps, uh...
Fit all the pieces together, Mrs. Hansen.
translation.zh: 把所有片段拼凑起来 汉森太太

translation.en: (INHALES) lf you could remember anything
from when you were interviewed, uh...
translation.zh: 你当初接受询问时发生的任何事

translation.en: Anything in particular that might, um...
It was Wednesday and she never came.
translation.zh: 那个周三 她没有来

translation.en: They said that she never got on the bus,
translation.zh: 他们说她根本没上公交车

translation.en: never even made it to the school.
Now, l assumed that she'd gone home.
And, uh, wh... What was she like, uh...
What were your Wednesdays with Ginny...
translation.zh: 你每周三和金妮的生活

translation.en: What were they like?
Oh, she would come in with her little knapsack
translation.zh: 她会背着她的小书包进来

translation.en: and plop it on the floor.
Give me a kiss on my cheek.
Big kiss, always my left cheek.
And then, it was time for work.
The moment she would sit at the piano,
we were all business.
translation.zh: 我们就会变得严肃起来

translation.en: And l would give her
her lesson just the same as all my other pupils.
translation.zh: 和我其他学生一样的课

translation.en: And it was no "Grandma" this or "Grandma" that.
translation.zh: 她不会因为我是她的外婆撒娇偷懒

translation.en: But the moment we were done,
she was my Ginny again.
How could God be so greedy?
Ma'am, l...
And after the lesson?
Cookies.
We would have cookies, if I'd baked them.
translation.zh: 如果我烤了饼干 我们就会吃饼干

translation.en: Or sometimes l would send her down to the Land of Christmas.
translation.zh: 有时候我会让她去楼下的

translation.en: The store downstairs, for candy or ice cream.
translation.zh: 圣诞之地商店买糖果或冰淇淋

translation.en: She would eat her sweets and l would read to her.
translation.zh: 她会吃她的糖果 我会给她读书

translation.en: She loved Andersen.
Who?
Do you know what he wrote in his story The Angel?
translation.zh: 你知道他在他的故事《天使》中是怎么写的吗？

translation.en: No. (CHUCKLES)
Here.
"Whenever a good child dies,
"an angel of God
"comes down from heaven
"and takes the child in his arms.
"And spreads out his great white wings.
translation.zh: 张开他巨大的白色翅膀

translation.en: "And flies with her
"over all the places
"that she loved during her life.
"And then, the child carries
translation.zh: 然后 那个孩子会拿着

translation.en: "a large handful of flowers
"up to God."
Beautiful.
JERRY: What's your name?
Becky. Becky Fiske.
And you were Ginny's best friend?
We sat together.
She died.
Yeah. l know.
Her grandmother told me that Ginny liked to tell stories.
translation.zh: 她外婆跟我说金妮喜欢讲故事

translation.en: Sometimes.
What kind of stories?
Ginny knew a giant.
Giant?
Really?
He was as big as a mountain and gave her porcupines.
translation.zh: 他像山一样高大 还给了她豪猪

translation.en: She called him "The Wizard."
Ginny made a picture of him.
Ginny drew a picture of a giant?
translation.zh: 金妮给一个巨人画了像？

translation.en: Can l see it?
lt's on the wall in the hallway.
We put Ginny's picture.
l gotta go.
Jean, hold my calls.
translation.zh: 珍 我的电话先别转过来

translation.en: I thought you were supposed to be fishing in Mexico.
translation.zh: 你应该在墨西哥钓鱼的

translation.en: Yeah. (CLEARS THROAT) I know, Stan.
l went to the airport.
l heard the boarding announcement.
And I... I just didn't feel right.
translation.zh: 都听到登机通知了 我只是觉得事情不对

translation.en: Something went off. l need more time on this.
translation.zh: 事情不对劲我需要更多时间来调查这个案子

translation.en: You want me to reopen a case because you got a hunch?
translation.zh: 你因为有某种直觉就想让我重新调查这个案子？

translation.en: Jerry, no offense, but you're retired. You don't work here anymore.
translation.zh: 杰瑞 恕我直言 你退休了已经不在这里工作了

translation.en: Okay.
l know, Stan.
l know. But could you run it through the system for me anyway?
translation.zh: 我知道但你能帮我在系统里查查吗？

translation.en: You know, just a standard query.
Similar crimes, profile, victims.
translation.zh: 类似的犯罪 资料 受害者

translation.en: Could you?
Say, for...
The last 10, 12 years.
Could you, Stan?
Please?
(COMPUTER BEEPING)
translation.zh: （失踪 推测已死亡日期：1997年10月12日） （姓名：凯瑟琳安奥尔斯塔德）

translation.en: MAN: This is eight years ago when this happened. (GROANS)
I'm on the job only six months at the point when this very big deal goes down.
translation.zh: 这桩大案发生时 我刚干了六个月

translation.en: Talk about baptism by fire.
translation.zh: 那真是一个严峻的考验

translation.en: And to top off everything else,
it was in the summer season.
"Politics of tourism" and all that nonsense.
So we all feel the pressure to make the bogeyman of it all disappear.
translation.zh: 所以我们都很有压力必须让这个恶魔消失

translation.en: The brass were pretty clear in the presumption
that it was one of those festival-goers.
translation.zh: 凶手是一个来参加节日的人

translation.en: Which seemed like, you know, a pretty good bet.
translation.zh: 这个推测似乎十拿九稳

translation.en: Not to mention, a good way to diffuse the kind of panic that people get.
translation.zh: 更何况 那样能很好地消除恐慌

translation.en: You know, when they feel like there's a bogeyman amongst them.
translation.zh: 更何况 那样能很好地消除恐慌 如果恶魔就在他们中间

translation.en: (GROANS) So we all figured,
and l do feel accurately, that's why we never did catch him.
translation.zh: 我也确实觉得这就是我们没抓住他的原因

translation.en: The odds were on a perpetrator
who'd cleared the county before the body was ever found.
translation.zh: 尸体被发现前就离开了本县

translation.en: Yeah.
Look at the slit in that neck.
I don't know, but for me...
translation.zh: 怎么说呢 对我而言

translation.en: For me, it's like being in a movie.
This stuff just doesn't bother me like it does some people. You?
translation.zh: 跟其他人不同我不会受到这种事的影响 你呢？

translation.en: Luanne Rotze.
A little 10-year-old girl.
Real little. l mean, real small for her age.
translation.zh: 真的很小 她比同龄人的个头要小

translation.en: You know what, though?
As horrible as that kind of thing is,
l got an adrenaline rush being part of it.
translation.zh: 但参与其中让我的肾上腺素激增

translation.en: I don't know if that's bad, but, hey, don't hurt me.
translation.zh: 我不知道这是不是坏事但又伤不到我

translation.en: That's just the way it hit me.
translation.zh: 这就是这个案子对我的影响

translation.en: Nothing like it ever happened before in that area.
translation.zh: 之前从未发生过此类案件

translation.en: By the way, nothing like it ever happened since.
translation.zh: 对了 之后再也没发生过此类案件

translation.en: And l think that says a lot.
translation.zh: 这个应该能说明很多问题

translation.en: You mind if l keep this one? I couldn't let you do that.
translation.zh: -你介意我拿走这张吗？-我不能让你拿走

translation.en: We always like to be of help, but
strictly technically, the case is still open.
translation.zh: 但严格来说 这个案子还没有了结

translation.en: Well, then how about the report?
I'll make you a copy. How's that?
translation.zh: 我会给你复印一份 怎么样？

translation.en: Sure would appreciate it.
But keep it between us.
I'm not sure what the policy is on this kind of thing. Okay?
translation.zh: 我不知道这类事情的政策是什么好吗？

translation.en: My lips are sealed.
Lucy!
A two-year-old horse is like a woman. You can't predict what they're gonna do.
translation.zh: 两岁的小马就和女人一样没法预知它们会做什么

translation.en: They're crazy.
Excuse me. Sir?
Sir?
translation.zh: 先生？ 你能否告诉我一个叫詹姆斯奥尔斯塔德的人在哪里

translation.en: I wonder if you could tell me where a man named James Olstad might be?
translation.zh: 你能否告诉我一个叫詹姆斯奥尔斯塔德的人在哪里

translation.en: Olstad's not a patient here.
translation.zh: 奥尔斯塔德不是这里的病人

translation.en: Oh. Well, l believe he's the custodian, sir.
translation.zh: 他应该是管理员 先生

translation.en: Maybe in the building, mopping? But he's not a patient here.
translation.zh: 可能在楼里拖地？他不是病人

translation.en: Mopping in the building? Yeah, but not a patient here.
James Olstad?
I'm Jerry Black. I'm a police detective.
translation.zh: 我是杰瑞布莱克 一个警探

translation.en: I'd just like to talk to you about your daughter.
translation.zh: 我过来和你谈谈你女儿的事

translation.en: What daughter?
You did have a daughter that went missing three years ago, didn't you?
translation.zh: 你确实有个女儿三年前失踪了 对吧？

translation.en: Did you come here to tell me that, uh, something happened to her?
translation.zh: 你是来告诉我她出事了吗？

translation.en: No, sir. lt was...
Did you find her dead or something?
No. No, sir. We're, uh...
We're still trying to find her.
Anything you might tell me about her?
translation.zh: 关于她 你有什么可以告诉我的吗？

translation.en: Could you describe her?
She must be...
She must be different now.
She was so pretty.
I miss her so much!
We just used to, like, hold each other.
translation.zh: 我们以前经常互相拥抱

translation.en: I was supposed to take care of her.
She was my little girl, you know? (SNIFFLES)
I just...
Where is my little girl?
Where is my baby?
The break is Monash County. Eight years ago, we got a homicide.
translation.zh: 突破点是莫纳什县八年前 那里发生过一起谋杀案

translation.en: Same MO.
Exact same victim profile description as the Ginny Larsen case.
translation.zh: 受害者的情况与金妮拉森案完全相同

translation.en: I interviewed one of the local officers for the particulars.
translation.zh: 我向一名当地警官询问了细节

translation.en: Little blonde girl, 10 years old, sexual assault, throat slit.
translation.zh: 金发女孩 10岁 性侵犯 割喉

translation.en: The photos show that she was wearing a red dress.
translation.zh: 这些照片表明她当时穿着一件红裙子

translation.en: Detectives out at Morehead covered this case. The case is still open.
translation.zh: 莫尔黑德的警探负责这个案子还没有结案

translation.en: At the time of the murders,
Toby Wadenah was in Stillwater Penitentiary,
translation.zh: 托比瓦德纳在斯蒂尔沃监狱

translation.en: doing time on his own rape conviction.
So, he couldn't have done it.
translation.zh: -所以不可能是他干的-他饮弹自尽了

translation.en: Jerry, the man shot himself.
translation.zh: -所以不可能是他干的-他饮弹自尽了 -还能…-是你跟他说他犯了罪

translation.en: What more do you want? You told him what he did and he believed you.
translation.zh: -还能…-是你跟他说他犯了罪 都冷静一下 看看杰瑞查到了什么查到什么了吗？

translation.en: All right, let's just calm down here a minute and see what Jerry's got. You got something, Jerry?
translation.zh: 都冷静一下 看看杰瑞查到了什么查到什么了吗？

translation.en: And there's more. More.
Here. See here?
translation.zh: 这个 看到这个了吗？

translation.en: This is the Larsen murder. This is the Monash County girl. And here...
translation.zh: 这是拉森谋杀案发生地这是莫纳什县凶案发生地 这里

translation.en: Here, you see this pattern?
translation.zh: 你们看到这片区域了吗？

translation.en: Three years ago, l got a girl gone missing, Cathy Olstad.
translation.zh: 三年前 有一个女孩失踪了她叫凯茜奥尔斯塔德

translation.en: Same exact description, a little blonde girl, nine years old,
translation.zh: 一模一样的类型 金发女孩 九岁

translation.en: last seen wearing a red dress.
translation.zh: 最后一次被看到时穿着红裙子

translation.en: And?
And?
Don't you see?
I see you've given a description that could fit any number of juvenile murders.
translation.zh: 我感觉你的描述符合很多未成年人被害案

translation.en: And a victim profile that matches every other little girl in the state, just about,
translation.zh: 不管穿不穿红裙子 都符合州内

translation.en: give or take the red dress.
translation.zh: 其他类似案件的受害者的描述

translation.en: I mean, why didn't you mention that her eyes were blue while you were at it? Come on, Jerry!
translation.zh: 你都提到红裙子了为什么不提她的蓝眼睛？拜托！

translation.en: I mean, whatever made you think
that the Larsen girl wasn't murdered by Wadenah?
translation.zh: 小女孩拉森不是被瓦德纳所杀？

translation.en: This did.
This convinced me.
Ginny's drawing of the Porcupine Giant.
I have reason to believe, based on my conversations and interviews,
translation.zh: 根据我的谈话和询问 我有理由相信

translation.en: that Ginny Larsen made this drawing just days before she was murdered.
translation.zh: 金妮拉森是在被杀的几天前画的这幅画

translation.en: I have reason to believe that she was meeting with this man,
translation.zh: 我有理由相信她见过这个男人

translation.en: seen here as a giant, all dressed in black, on a regular basis.
translation.zh: 而且是经常见这个穿黑衣服的巨人

translation.en: This is not an lndian. This is not an lndian type.
translation.zh: 他不是印第安人不是印第安人的模样

translation.en: And you see this car here? This big, black car?
translation.zh: 你们看到这辆车了吗？一辆黑色的大车？

translation.en: This is not a truck.
This is not a maroon truck like Wadenah drove.
translation.zh: 不是瓦德纳开的褐红色卡车

translation.en: This is a big, black station wagon.
translation.zh: 这是一辆黑色的旅行轿车

translation.en: And these right here, these, according to an interview l had
translation.zh: 还有这里 根据我对一个叫

translation.en: with a girl named Beck... (STAMMERS)
translation.zh: 贝…贝琪菲斯克的女孩的询问

translation.en: Betsy Fiske, these are porcupines.
translation.zh: 贝…贝琪菲斯克的女孩的询问 -这些是豪猪-好了 哇！等等

translation.en: Okay. Whoa! Hold it.
translation.zh: -这些是豪猪-好了 哇！等等

translation.en: Porcupines and giants and...
You got to get ahold of yourself, Jerry.
The case is closed.
I made a promise.
I made a promise to find
Ginny Larsen's murderer.
I intend to keep it.
Listen, Jerry.
You gotta start getting on with your life, you know?
translation.zh: 你得开始过自己的生活了

translation.en: I mean, sometimes when you go through big changes,
translation.zh: 有时候你经历巨大转变时…

translation.en: and retirement's definitely one of them,
it can cause a lot of added stress.
Sometimes it's a good idea just to
translation.zh: 有时候 你可以找个人

translation.en: talk to someone. You know, someone
professional.
I made a promise, Eric.
translation.zh: 我做出了承诺 埃里克

translation.en: You're old enough to remember when that meant something.
translation.zh: 你这个年纪的人应该还记得言出必行的年代

translation.en: (SIGHS) Get a life.
WOMAN: Jerry, got your fresh towels here!
translation.zh: 杰瑞 我给你拿了新毛巾！

translation.en: Most folks don't need them every day.
translation.zh: 大多数人并不会每天都用

translation.en: But I'd appreciate it if you'd not get them so dirty that they're not to be white again.
translation.zh: 请不要把它们弄得太脏免得洗不干净

translation.en: Here's your nice little sunroom. You can smoke in here.
translation.zh: 这里是你的日光房你可以在这里吸烟

translation.en: This is the living room area. No partying, please, no.
translation.zh: 这里是客厅 请不要在这里开派对

translation.en: Kitchen, of course. All the amenities of home.
translation.zh: 当然还有厨房 所有家用设施

translation.en: Bedroom. We just put a new mattress on there. So it should be really comfy.
translation.zh: 卧室 我们刚刚换了新床垫所以应该会很舒服

translation.en: And, oh, yeah, trash goes in the covered dumpster.
translation.zh: 还有 把垃圾放在带盖子的垃圾桶内

translation.en: And fish guts you gotta wrap and place in the covered pail next to the cleaning station.
translation.zh: 你得把鱼内脏包起来放在鱼类废料清洁台旁边的桶里

translation.en: Rules and regulations of Sugar Bush up here. Yep.
translation.zh: 度假屋的规章制度在这里 没错

translation.en: And no nude sunbathing.
So, l'll leave these here and I'll get Rose to come make up your bed.
translation.zh: 我把这些放在这里让罗丝来给你铺床

translation.en: If there's anything else you'll be needing, just let me know. Okeydokey?
translation.zh: 如果你有别的需要 就告诉我 好吗？

translation.en: Good morning.
I'll have a pack of lights.
That the owner?
My daddy.
What can l do for you?
Well, l was just having a look around.
How long you had this place?
Oh, 30 years.
Ever think about selling it?
No.
Well, uh, gee. What would it take to get you to think about selling?
(CLEARS THROAT) lt's not for sale.
I'll tell you what.
I'll give you my number over where l'm staying.
At Thompson's Sugar Bush Resort.
translation.zh: 汤普森滑雪度假胜地的电话给你

translation.en: I don't mean to be pushy, but...
translation.zh: 我不是有意要催你 但是

translation.en: If you'd think about it...
I'll wait to hear from you over at Thompson's, if it's all right.
translation.zh: 我会在汤普森等你的消息如果可以的话

translation.en: Been a pleasure. Thanks for coming in.
translation.zh: -很高兴认识你们-谢谢你的光临

translation.en: Nice place.
RESORT OWNER: You didn't tell me you were a cop!
Ex-cop. Ha! Once a cop...
I'm retired.
Uh, what l wanted to tell you was that Floyd Cage called.
translation.zh: 我是想告诉你弗洛伊德凯奇打电话来了

translation.en: The fellow with the gas station. He says he wants to talk to you.
translation.zh: 加油站那个人 他说想和你谈谈

translation.en: l see they're biting.
You bet. Sure does look like it.
translation.zh: 是的 看起来确实如此

translation.en: You can use the phone up in the front cabin here.
translation.zh: 你可以用前面那个小屋的电话

translation.en: Thank you.
Well, Floyd, Jerry signed all the papers. You're ready to go.
translation.zh: 弗洛伊德 杰瑞把文件都签好了没问题了

translation.en: Well, l sure appreciate it. You've done a good job.
Good luck.
When we get a number down in Arizona, we'll give you a call, leave you our number.
translation.zh: 等我们在亚利桑那有了电话一定会联系你

translation.en: I'm going to Arizona!
